You are trying to buy more Bitcoins than your current balance can allow. Your limit when trying to break-even is how much you have sold. When entering the buy back price, we calculate the optimal amount of Bitcoins you should buy automatically.

An Android app designed for Bitcoin trading. It can calculate the breakeven point and profit margins for your Bitcoin trades. It is useful for minimizing losses as well as maximizing profits especially because Bitcoin tends to be volatile.
